title: Ticket #4023: 64bit port of HTCondor on Windows
description:
HTCondor has never supported a proper 64bit version on Windows, which has necessitated various workarounds due to the lying that happens when running an application under WOW64. A true fix would be to have HTCondor be built as a 64bit application.

Two major complications are present, the first being the external libraries and the other being the exception handling code for Windows.
